start: ^So you've sanitize the main cause of the flu. That's great!. However, we have new details about the samples you have given. It seems that there are a few more viruses among the flu that are still dormant.

^Though there is a concerning virus, Tuberculosis. We are still unsure if it really is a problem, just to make sure you should check if there are any other students that look sick and get some samples from them.
